questions.question: By 'GoF Design Pattern' book, what are the 3 types/classifications of Design Patterns?
When the 'Mediator' Design Pattern is used?
answers: When you need to ensure that only K instance of the object exists throughout runtime
When you have classes that can’t work together because of incompatible interfaces
When you want to reduce the complexity and dependencies between tightly coupled objects communicating directly with one another
When you want to allow to create objects without specifying the exact class of object that will be created

questions.question: What is the goal of 'Validation testing' ?
answers: To demonstrate to the developer and the system customer that the software meets its requirements
To demonstrate to the developer and the system customer that the software conform to its specification
To expose defects in the system

questions.question: What is the definition of 'Unit testing' ?
answers: The application system that provides the business services .
The process that starts when you create an initial project plan during the project startup phase.
The process of testing individual components in isolation.

questions.question: Which of the following is not an example for non-functional requirements ?
